title: Charades

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you can use one ability from any non-unique Wiki Mafia town role, but you can’t tell your host which one through words or emojis.
- You must draw a visual depiction of what you want to do. You may not include words in your drawing.
- The host interprets the drawing and you perform the interpreted action.
- You can’t communicate to the host of your intentions in other ways (ie: “if I draw a cowboy hat it means I’m targeting sheriff” as a whisper or in day chat)
- Your host can ask you up to one question per night about either the action or targets. You may answer with a sentence.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Attributes from your chosen role are copied over (ie: kill self on failed vigilante shot, roleblock immunity for escort)
